mapper.select: SELECT u.user_name, r.title AS title, a.`name` AS addressName, i.img_name AS imgName, i.img_dir AS imgDir FROM user_like ul, `user` u, image i, address a, resource r WHERE ul.user_id = u.id AND u.address_id = a.id AND ul.resource_id = r.id AND r.image_id = i.id AND ul.user_id = #{userId}
mapper.delete: delete from user_like where user_id=#{userId} and resource_id=#{resourceId}
